m_szDocTitle: Ford pulls plug on all-electric cars | News | Geek.com
m_szDocSumamry: Ford pulls plug on all-electric cars By  Sep. 4, 2002 11:08 am Subscribing to a newsletter indicates your consent to our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy . More Geek Are AMDâ€™s 3 new gaming chips destined for PS4K, Xbox One Slim, and Nintendo NX? Ford Motor Company has abandoned its all-electric car division, making the case that electric cars are not yet profitable. General Motors and Honda both shut down their electric car divisions in 1999, and analysts say Ford's decision marks the death of the technology. In 1999, Ford introduced two new electric vehicles: the TH!NK and the TH!NK City. The
